cause.description:
Lois' Lodge is an interdenominational, Christian organization that provides practical love, care and support to women experiencing the challenges of unplanned pregnancies. The residents of Lois' Lodge receive housing, food and health care. They are also provided with spiritual and emotional guidance and support in regard to their parenting options. We seek to create an atmosphere where women experience positive and enabling family relationships.
www.loislodge.org www.loislodge.blogspot.com www.loislodge1000.blogspot.com
1. Jesus Christ is the true source of healing and redemption.
2. We are "pro-living", ministering to pregnant women and to the family unit after the child is born.
3. Choosing to allow someone else to parent your child though adoption is an honorable choice.
cause.mission: provide shelter, practical love, care and support to women facing the challenges of an unexpected pregnancy in an environment that encourages them toward responsible choices and a stable future.
cause.name: Alternative to Abortion- Lois' Lodge
